query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'team_members' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2mZrnr2Ed9aCf94.e70a2c25fc99 --database PN9NN3GJE6ZdsW9AYjn6LX --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'team_members' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
id	int(11)	NO
userId	int(11)	NO
position	varchar(255)	YES
department	varchar(255)	YES
isActive	tinyint(1)	NO
createdAt	timestamp	NO
updatedAt	timestamp	NO
